Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Incredibly \In*cred"i*bly\, adv. In an incredible manner. [1913 Webster]

incredibly adv : not easy to believe; "behind you the coastal hills plunge to the incredibly blue sea backed by the Turkish mountains" [syn: {improbably}, {implausibly}, {unbelievably}] [ant: {believably}, {credibly}]
